comment.author: 77320346@N07
comment._content: Wow, these lovely people look oblivious to the WW2 raging on in Europe. I wonder if life happen to different people in different ways.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/focusonportraits]  But the Phoney War had only ended a few days before, WW2 was not raging yet.
